Method.name: RenderStartTag
Method.Implementation: New element Set element=##this Set %statuscode=$$$OK Do ..CompilerMethod1() Quit:$$$ISERR(%statuscode) %statuscode Do ..WriteCSPText("",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<OBJECT ID=""##($G(id,""FlexGrid""))##"" style='##($G(style))##' CLASSID=""CLSID:6262D3A0-531B-11CF-91F6-C2863C385E30"">",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""Appearance"" VALUE=""0""> ",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""AllowUserResizing"" VALUE=""3""> ",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""BorderStyle"" VALUE=""1"">",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""ScrollBars"" VALUE=""3"">",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""BackColorBkg"" VALUE=""16777215"">",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""FixedCols"" VALUE=""1"">",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("<PARAM NAME=""GridLinesUnpopulated"" VALUE=""1"">",1) Do ..WriteCSPText("</OBJECT>",0) Quit $$$SKIPCHILDREN
